description:
ActivityWatch is an app that automatically tracks how you spend time on your devices.

The goal of ActivityWatch is simple, Enable the collection of as much valuable lifedata as possible without compromising user privacy.
These are the release notes for ActivityWatch version v0.13.1.New to ActivityWatch? Check out the website and the README.Installation
See the getting started guide in the documentation.Downloads
- Windows (.exe, installer)
- macOS (.dmg)
- Linux (.zip)
Contributors
Thanks to everyone who contributed to this release:@BelKed, @erikbjareChangelog
